License

All graphical assets in this template are licensed for personal and commercial use. If you'd like to use a specific asset, please check the license below

Fonts

The fonts used in the template are licensed under open source licenses, making them free to use for both personal and commercial projects. Specifically, the font Geist and Gambarino are available for commercial use without any restrictions, ensuring a robust and legally sound foundation for the typography in your design projects.

Gambarino license Info: https://www.fontshare.com/licenses/itf-ffl
Geist license Info: https://github.com/vercel/geist-font/blob/main/LICENSE.txt

Images

All images and videos on this website are sourced from Unsplash and Pexels. We are grateful to the talented photographers and videographers who generously share their work on these platforms, allowing us to enhance our content with their stunning visuals.
